channel.title: CVE Feed for Butterfly Button -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-24499|2024-08-02T10:56:04.193Z -- butterfly%20button -- butterfly%20button%20plugin
item.description: Butterfly Button plugin may leave traces of its use on user's device. Since it is used for reporting domestic problems, this may lead to spouse knowing about its use.
